mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (id, opr_time, leave_time, type, user_id, moudle, operation, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moudle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from sys_log where type=#{type} order by opr_time desc

select l.id as id, u.name as userName, u.phone as userPhone, l.moudle as moudle, l.operation as operation, l.opr_time as oprTime from sys_log l,user u where l.type = '1' and l.user_id = u.id order by l.opr_time ASC

select l.id as id, u.name as userName, u.phone as userPhone, u.office_name as officeName, u.post as post, l.opr_time as oprTime, l.operation as operation from sys_log l left join user u on l.user_id = u.id where l.type = '2' order by l.id ASC
select l.remark as remark, l.operation as operation, l.opr_time as oprTime from sys_log l where l.type = '3' order by l.opr_time ASC
